quotes: Cameron's father was born at Blairmore House near Huntly, Aberdeenshire, and died near Toulon, France, on 8 September 2010;
who had made a fortune in the grain trade in Chicago, United States, before returning to Scotland in the 1880s.

quotes: From the age of seven, he was taught at Heatherdown School in Winkfield, Berkshire.

organizations.name: Eton College
quotes: At the age of 13, he went on to Eton College in Berkshire, following his father and elder brother.
